name: Oiled Orichalcum Pauldron Casing

name: Oiled Orichalcum Greatsword Blade

name: Toxic Spider Queen's Venom
description: Double-click to combine the venoms of a Canyon Spider Queen, Toxic Spider Queen, Enraged Spider Queen, and Gargantula in an Empty Hylek Flask to create the Arachnid Venom Decanter.

description: Contains the Essence of Prey and recipes for first-tier Howl.

description: Double-click to apply this look to any other axe.

name: Cliffside Challenge Mote
description:
Complete the Cliffside Challenge (scale 2150)! Beat the Archdiviner with an 80% reduction to all healing!
To activate challenge mode, speak with the challenge mote near the beginning of the fractal. A party vote is required to activate.

name: Resonating Sliver
description: Earned by completing guild missions and dailies, and by mining the ore node in guild halls.

name: Tricks and Tips for Advanced Dagger Crafting
description: Contains the book "Expertise in Dagger Crafting" and recipes for second-tier Spark.

name: Aetherblade Fractal Field Research Paper
description: Complete Daily Recommended Fractals to obtain Fractal Research Pages. Combine the pages into a completed journal and exchange it for an Aetherblade Fractal Research Paper from the Aetherblade Field Researcher located at the end of the Captain Mai Trin Boss fractal. This item only has value as part of a collection.

name: Charged Archdiviner's Mallet
description:
Take the Archdiviner's Mallet from his remains at the top of the Cliffside fractal. Jump into the middle of the exploded Thaumanova Reactor in Metrica Province to charge it.
This item only has value as part of a collection.
